title: On my 3rd pixel 4 (warranty replaced) bluetooth volume issues
content: Bleuototh maxs out at 45 percent volume.. thats after paring and comparing it to a iphone and samsung s10.. had to drop the volume to 45% to match pixel 4 output at a hundred percent. Low volume tho volume setting are maxed.. on all 3 pixels and no fix done everything the web suggest.. read to get rid and switch need something with high volume for work wen running heavy equipment.
